mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO dishonesty( id, age, bbd_dotime, bbd_source, bbd_type, bbd_uptime, bbd_url, bbd_xgxx_id,case_code,case_create_time, concrete_situation,definiteo_bligation,exe_code,exec_basunit,exec_court_name,frname,gender,idtype, perform_degree,pname,pname_id,province,pubdate,type,bbd_qyxx_id,create_time,task_id) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.age}, #{item.bbd_dotime}, #{item.bbd_source}, #{item.bbd_type}, #{item.bbd_uptime}, #{item.bbd_url}, #{item.bbd_xgxx_id}, #{item.case_code}, #{item.case_create_time}, #{item.concrete_situation}, #{item.definiteo_bligation}, #{item.exe_code}, #{item.exec_basunit}, #{item.exec_court_name},#{item.frname}, #{item.gender}, #{item.idtype}, #{item.perform_degree}, #{item.pname}, #{item.pname_id}, #{item.province}, #{item.pubdate}, #{item.type}, #{item.bbd_qyxx_id}, #{item.create_time}, #{item.task_id})

INSERT INTO ktgg( id, action_cause, bbd_dotime, bbd_qyxx_id, bbd_source, bbd_type, bbd_uptime,bbd_version ,case_code,city, litigant,main,title,trial_date,create_time,bbd_url,asstarting,task_id) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.action_cause}, #{item.bbd_dotime}, #{item.bbd_qyxx_id}, #{item.bbd_source}, #{item.bbd_type}, #{item.bbd_uptime}, #{item.bbd_version}, #{item.case_code}, #{item.city}, #{item.litigant}, #{item.main}, #{item.title}, #{item.trial_date}, #{item.create_time},#{item.bbd_url}, #{item.asstarting}, #{item.task_id})

INSERT INTO qyxg_yuqing( abstract, author,bbd_dotime ,bbd_source , bbd_type,bbd_uptime ,bbd_url ,bbd_xgxx_id,comment_num, main,news_site,news_title,picture,plate,pubdate,rowkey,search_key,status,table_name, transfer_num,id,create_time,bbd_qyxx_id,task_id) VALUES
(#{item.articleAbstract}, #{item.author}, #{item.bbd_dotime}, #{item.bbd_source}, #{item.bbd_type}, #{item.bbd_uptime}, #{item.bbd_url}, #{item.bbd_xgxx_id}, #{item.comment_num}, #{item.main}, #{item.news_site}, #{item.news_title}, #{item.picture}, #{item.plate},#{item.pubdate}, #{item.rowkey}, #{item.search_key}, #{item.status}, #{item.table_name}, #{item.transfer_num}, #{item.id}, now(), #{item.bbd_qyxx_id}, #{item.task_id})

INSERT INTO qyxg_yuqing( abstract, author,bbd_dotime ,bbd_source , bbd_type,bbd_uptime ,bbd_url ,bbd_xgxx_id,comment_num, main,news_site,news_title,picture,plate,pubdate,rowkey,search_key,status,table_name, transfer_num,id,create_time,bbd_qyxx_id,task_id) SELECT #{articleAbstract}, #{author}, #{bbd_dotime}, #{bbd_source}, #{bbd_type}, #{bbd_uptime}, #{bbd_url}, #{bbd_xgxx_id}, #{comment_num}, #{main}, #{news_site}, #{news_title}, #{picture}, #{plate},#{pubdate}, #{rowkey}, #{search_key}, #{status}, #{table_name}, #{transfer_num}, #{id}, now(), #{bbd_qyxx_id}, #{task_id} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM qyxg_yuqing WHERE bbd_xgxx_id=#{bbd_xgxx_id})

INSERT INTO qyxx_basic( id, address,approval_date ,bbd_dotime ,bbd_history_name ,bbd_qyxx_id ,bbd_type , bbd_uptime,cancel_date,company_companytype, company_county,company_currency,company_enterprise_status,company_industry,company_name,company_province,company_regorg,company_type, credit_code,enterprise_status,esdate,form,frname,frname_id,invest_cap,investcap_amount,investcap_currency,ipo_company, openfrom,opento,operate_scope,operating_period,parent_firm,realcap,realcap_amount,realcap_currency,regcap,regcap_amount, regcap_currency,regcapcur,regno,regno_or_creditcode,regorg,revoke_date,type,frname_compid,create_time,task_id) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.address}, #{item.approval_date}, #{item.bbd_dotime}, #{item.bbd_history_name}, #{item.bbd_qyxx_id}, #{item.bbd_type}, #{item.bbd_uptime}, #{item.cancel_date}, #{item.company_companytype}, #{item.company_county}, #{item.company_currency}, #{item.company_enterprise_status}, #{item.company_industry}, #{item.company_name},#{item.company_province}, #{item.company_regorg}, #{item.company_type}, #{item.credit_code}, #{item.enterprise_status}, #{item.esdate}, #{item.form}, #{item.frname}, #{item.frname_id}, #{item.invest_cap}, #{item.investcap_amount}, #{item.investcap_currency}, #{item.ipo_company}, #{item.openfrom}, #{item.opento},#{item.operate_scope}, #{item.operating_period},#{item.parent_firm}, #{item.realcap},#{item.realcap_amount}, #{item.realcap_currency},#{item.regcap}, #{item.regcap_amount}, #{item.regcap_currency}, #{item.regcapcur},#{item.regno}, #{item.regno_or_creditcode},#{item.regorg}, #{item.revoke_date},#{item.type}, #{item.frname_compid}, now(), #{item.task_id})

INSERT INTO qyxx_baxx( id, bbd_dotime, bbd_qyxx_id,bbd_uptime ,company_name , position ,idtype,name,name_id,task_id) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.bbd_dotime}, #{item.bbd_qyxx_id}, #{item.bbd_uptime}, #{item.company_name}, #{item.position},#{item.idtype}, #{item.name}, #{item.name_id}, #{item.task_id})

INSERT INTO qyxx_gdxx( id, bbd_dotime, bbd_qyxx_id,bbd_uptime ,company_name ,idno ,idtype ,invest_amount ,invest_name,invest_ratio, name_compid,no,paid_contribution,shareholder_detail,shareholder_id,shareholder_name,shareholder_type,subscribed_capital,create_time,sumconam,task_id) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.bbd_dotime}, #{item.bbd_qyxx_id}, #{item.bbd_uptime}, #{item.company_name}, #{item.idno}, #{item.idtype}, #{item.invest_amount}, #{item.invest_name}, #{item.invest_ratio}, #{item.name_compid}, #{item.no}, #{item.paid_contribution},#{item.shareholder_detail}, #{item.shareholder_id}, #{item.shareholder_name}, #{item.shareholder_type}, #{item.subscribed_capital}, now(), #{item.sumconam}, #{item.task_id})

INSERT INTO qyxx_zhuanli( id,bbd_qyxx_id ,address ,agent_name ,application_code , application_code_wanfang, application_date,class_code ,class_code_wanfang,company_name, inventor,patent_type,patent_agency,title,public_code,publidate,applicant,independent_claim,law_state,main_classcode, npc_code,approval_issue_date,approval_num,bg_publication_date,biology_preserve,compare_file,decode_announce_date,division_application,fmgb,fmsq, homeland_prority,pct_application_data,pct_enter_national,pct_publish_data,priority,wgsq,xxsq,bbd_source, bbd_dotime,bbd_type,bbd_url,create_time,sumconam,task_id) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.bbd_qyxx_id}, #{item.address}, #{item.agent_name}, #{item.application_code}, #{item.application_code_wanfang}, #{item.application_date}, #{item.class_code}, #{item.class_code_wanfang}, #{item.company_name}, #{item.inventor}, #{item.patent_type}, #{item.patent_agency}, #{item.title}, #{item.public_code}, #{item.publidate}, #{item.applicant}, #{item.independent_claim}, #{item.law_state}, #{item.main_classcode}, #{item.npc_code}, #{item.approval_issue_date}, #{item.approval_num}, #{item.bg_publication_date}, #{item.biology_preserve}, #{item.compare_file}, #{item.decode_announce_date}, #{item.division_application}, #{item.fmgb}, #{item.fmsq}, #{item.homeland_prority}, #{item.pct_application_data}, #{item.pct_enter_national}, #{item.pct_publish_data},#{item.priority}, #{item.wgsq}, #{item.xxsq}, #{item.bbd_source}, #{item.bbd_dotime}, #{item.bbd_type}, #{item.bbd_url}, now(), #{item.sumconam}, #{item.task_id})

INSERT INTO rmfygg( id,attachment ,bbd_dotime ,bbd_source ,bbd_type , bbd_uptime, bbd_url,bbd_xgxx_id ,litigant,notice_content, notice_people,notice_time,notice_type,bbd_qyxx_id,create_time,task_id) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.attachment}, #{item.bbd_dotime}, #{item.bbd_source}, #{item.bbd_type}, #{item.bbd_uptime}, #{item.bbd_url}, #{item.bbd_xgxx_id}, #{item.litigant}, #{item.notice_content}, #{item.notice_people}, #{item.notice_time}, #{item.notice_type}, #{item.bbd_qyxx_id}, #{item.create_time}, #{item.task_id})

INSERT INTO offline_financial_record( company_id ,credit_code ,company_name ,organization_code ,create_date) VALUES
(#{item.company_id}, #{item.credit_code}, #{item.company_name}, #{item.organization_code}, CURDATE())
mapper.select:
select id, address,approval_date ,bbd_dotime ,bbd_history_name ,bbd_qyxx_id ,bbd_type , bbd_uptime,cancel_date,company_companytype, company_county,company_currency,company_enterprise_status,company_industry,company_name,company_province,company_regorg,company_type, credit_code,enterprise_status,esdate,form,frname,frname_id,invest_cap,investcap_amount,investcap_currency,ipo_company, openfrom,opento,operate_scope,operating_period,parent_firm,realcap,realcap_amount,realcap_currency,regcap,regcap_amount, regcap_currency,regcapcur,regno,regno_or_creditcode,regorg,revoke_date,type,frname_compid,create_time,task_id FROM qyxx_basic where company_name in
#{item.name}

SELECT company_name AS companyName, frname AS legalPeople, regcap AS capital, address AS address, esdate AS openedTime, approval_date AS verifiedTime, regorg AS registerOffice FROM qyxx_basic WHERE company_name = #{companyName} ORDER BY basic_id DESC LIMIT 1;
